architectureStyle.description: Ice-adapted, military proud - built for a passionate warrior culture from a frozen moon
keyElements: Ice-crystal inspired architecture with sharp angles
Blue and white coloring matching Andorian skin
Underground elements - Andorian cities extend below surface
Imperial Guard militarism evident even in civilian buildings
Insulated construction for ice world environment
Dueling arenas for Ushaan honor combat
architectureStyle.colors: Ice-blue, white, silver accents, deep blue, frost patterns
architectureStyle.materials: Ice-resistant alloys, crystalline composites, thermal insulation
